Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Authorizes certain law enforcement personnel to apply for an exemption from the restrictions on employment with gaming activity entities
Summary: Authorizes certain law enforcement personnel to apply for an exemption from the restrictions on employment with gaming activity entities.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to authorizing certain law enforcement personnel to apply for an exemption from the restrictions on employment with gaming activity entities
